t: Amazon.com: Planted Perfect
s: Our Garden Mission Gardening’s a passion, a pastime, a way life. We toil days, weeks, years - on our knees, in the dirt, basking in the natural beauty all around us as we strive to craft our own piece of blissful perfection. As gardeners ourselves, we understand the art that is garden making.

t: A guy planted two potatoes in an Amazon shipping box to prove a point. Mission accomplished.
s: Gardener James Prigioni shared an experiment in which he planted two Amazon cardboard boxes with two different varieties of potatoes to see how well they would grow and if they would hold up. He wanted to show people that you don't have to spend a lot of money or have a lot of space to garden.
